name: BED_PLAN_HX
description: This table contains information about edits that occurred on pending event records.

columns.name: PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pending action record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_INST
columns.description: The instant when the pending action record was updated.

columns.name: ORD_ID
columns.description: The linked order ID (I PND 560) at the time that the pending event was updated,

columns.name: LOA_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The leave of absence reason category ID for the bed planning event history.
entries: <marquee>Tried to type with monster claws from Godzilla costume on</marquee>

columns.name: HX_BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: History item for requested bed type.

columns.name: UPDATE_INST_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant when the pending event was updated. For UTC, use BED_PLAN_HX.UPDATE_INST.
